Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.client

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.client.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientObserver
public class ClientController extends Object implements ClientObserver
A controller on client's side. It instantiates a Client when connection info are provided. It observes the View. From Server receives message through Client and update the view through the ClientSideVisitor From View receives input and send them to the server through Client. It uses a NotificationVisitor to dispatch the notification sent by the Server and to perform action on the view.
